objects.text:
✓ High IR Reflection & Emissivity
✓ Thermal Comfort Without AC
✓ Prevents Roof Cracks
✓ Eco-Friendly, Almost Nil VOC

product_details.name: PANACHE Cool Tops Eco I R Reflective Cool Roof Coating –Thermal Comfort Without Ac! Cool Top Eco - Cool, Elastomeric & Crack Free Roof Coating 5 Kg Bucket
product_details.description: Cooler Roofs mean longer life of roofs with crack prevention & contribution to indoor cooling. Cool Tops Eco is a single component elastomeric ready to use emulsion with high reflectivity & high emissivity. Cool Top Eco has SRI of 102. It is self-priming and can be applied directly to substrate with brush/roller & spray. Two to three coats of Cool Top Eco gives temperature difference on the substrate exposed to solar radiations. Cool Top Eco amends roof and provides energy conservation with temperature stability. It's being eco-friendly, almost nil VOC adds to environment benefits. Different pastel color shades can also be achieved with reflective pigments.

banner_details:
This banner presents an eco-friendly roof coating product with a fresh, contemporary design. Dominated by geometric overlays and diagonals, the layout balances text elements with a strong product visual. The top section includes a bold, uppercase heading (`heading`) and a vibrant subheading (`subheading`) that grabs attention. Below, the feature list (`description`) is structured with checkmarks, emphasizing benefits like thermal comfort and eco-friendliness. A clear price section includes a label (`price_label`) and large, colorful price text (`price`), with product weight noted in the tagline (`tagline`). At the bottom, a green call-to-action button (`cta`) is layered on a rounded rectangle (`cta_background`). The right side shows the product image (`product_image`), seamlessly integrated into the diagonal teal background.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Green: #00A79D
- Dark Teal: #006D64
- Light Green: #9ED84A
- White: #FFFFFF
- Cool Gray: #F5F5F5
- Charcoal Black: #333333
product_color: The product image features a clean and modern color palette consisting of cool and eco-centric tones, aligning well with its function. The primary color is a soothing teal green (#008b8f), covering the majority of the label and evoking freshness and environmental friendliness. It contrasts sharply against the crisp white (#ffffff) background and lid, providing a clean and clinical look while helping text stand out. Deep navy blue (#0c2e56) is used for the brand name and text, adding professionalism and readability. Lime green (#b3d330) in the logo adds a subtle eco-friendly accent. These colors are well-blended, maintaining contrast while highlighting key elements.
